title: The godless party
author: VD
content_html: Since we’ve been on the topic of God, it’s a good time to mention this piece by Rod Dreher. Mr. Dreher, formerly of National Review and now an editor with the official favorite newspaper of VD – sounds a lot better when TMQ says that, doesn’t it – the Dallas Morning News, wrote this excellent article on why the Democratic party is becoming increasingly marginalized. It also explains why the Republican party is getting so many new members whose commitment to smaller government and traditional values is slim to nonexistent, as they’re basically Democrats at heart who simply can no longer stomach the militant atheism of the new and improved and purified Democrats.
